extendedInfo.description: Drive Apple app is your personal, mobile automotive assistant to allow you to browse across Apple Automotive Group's dealership locations:-Search dealership locations in one app by using your location or finding on the locations map-You can select your preferred store to view Special Offers, New/Used vehicle inventory and to schedule service appointments (you can switch your store at any time by going back to the locations map)-Pull service history by registering your vehicle by VIN and Last Name-Receive Service Reminders for your registered vehicles-Useful car tools such as flashlight, parking assistant and finding the cheapest nearby gas-And much, much moreâ¦.
